trace.description: Push order changes for the specified symbol
Push order changes for all symbol
Subscribe this topic to get the realtime push of balance change
Subscribe this topic to get the realtime push of position change event of a symbol

trace.summary: All symbol position change events push
trace.description: Subscribe this topic to get the realtime push of position change event of all symbol
Subscribe this topic to get the realtime push of margin mode change event of a symbol
Subscribe this topic to get the realtime push of leverage change of contracts that are in cross margin mode
Subscribe this topic to get the realtime push of stop order changes.

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-221752070)

orderId.description: The unique order id generated by the trading system

x-api-enum.name: open
x-api-enum.description: the order is in the order book（maker order）

x-api-enum.name: match
x-api-enum.description: the message sent when the order is match,  1. When the status is open and the type is match, it is a maker match.  2. When the status is match and the type is match, it is a taker match.

x-api-enum.name: update
x-api-enum.description: The message sent due to the order being modified: STP triggering, partial cancellation of the order. Includes these three situations:  1. When the status is open and the type is update: partial amounts of the order have been canceled, or STP triggers  2. When the status is match and the type is update: STP triggers  3. When the status is done and the type is update: partial amounts of the order have been filled and the unfilled part got canceled, or STP is triggered.

x-api-enum.name: filled
x-api-enum.description: The message sent when the status of the order changes to DONE after the transaction

x-api-enum.name: canceled
x-api-enum.description: The message sent when the status of the order changes to DONE due to being canceled

x-api-enum.name: open
x-api-enum.description: the order is in the order book（maker order）

x-api-enum.name: match
x-api-enum.description: when taker order executes with orders in the order book, the taker order status is “match”

x-api-enum.name: done
x-api-enum.description: the order is fully executed successfully

liquidity.description: Actual transaction order type, If the counterparty order is an [Hidden/Iceberg Order](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146), even if it is a maker order, this param will be displayed as taker. For actual trading fee, please refer to the **feeType**

tradeId.description: Trade id, it is generated by Matching engine.

clientOid.description: Client Order Id，The ClientOid field is a unique ID created by the user

x-api-enum.name: liquid
x-api-enum.description: Liquid order, except type=update, all other types will be pushed

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-221752070)

orderId.description: The unique order id generated by the trading system

x-api-enum.name: open
x-api-enum.description: the order is in the order book（maker order）

x-api-enum.name: match
x-api-enum.description: the message sent when the order is match,  1. When the status is open and the type is match, it is a maker match.  2. When the status is match and the type is match, it is a taker match.

x-api-enum.name: update
x-api-enum.description: The message sent due to the order being modified: STP triggering, partial cancellation of the order. Includes these three situations:  1. When the status is open and the type is update: partial amounts of the order have been canceled, or STP triggers  2. When the status is match and the type is update: STP triggers  3. When the status is done and the type is update: partial amounts of the order have been filled and the unfilled part got canceled, or STP is triggered.

x-api-enum.name: filled
x-api-enum.description: The message sent when the status of the order changes to DONE after the transaction

x-api-enum.name: canceled
x-api-enum.description: The message sent when the status of the order changes to DONE due to being canceled

x-api-enum.name: open
x-api-enum.description: the order is in the order book（maker order）

x-api-enum.name: match
x-api-enum.description: when taker order executes with orders in the order book, the taker order status is “match”

x-api-enum.name: done
x-api-enum.description: the order is fully executed successfully

liquidity.description: Actual transaction order type, If the counterparty order is an [Hidden/Iceberg Order](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146), even if it is a maker order, this param will be displayed as taker. For actual trading fee, please refer to the **feeType**

tradeId.description: Trade id, it is generated by Matching engine.

clientOid.description: Client Order Id，The ClientOid field is a unique ID created by the user

x-api-enum.name: liquid
x-api-enum.description: Liquid order, except type=update, all other types will be pushed

crossPosMargin.description: Margin of the cross margin position

isolatedOrderMargin.description: Margin of the isolated margin order

version.description: Version. When holding a cross margin position, the available balance may change with fluctuations in the mark price, leading to discrepancies in the available balance for the same version number.

isolatedPosMargin.description: Margin of the isolated margin position, including isolated margin funding fees

crossUnPnl.description: Unrealized PNL in cross margin mode

totalCrossMargin.description: Total margin under cross margin mode

isolatedUnPnl.description: Unrealized PNL in isolated margin mode

crossOrderMargin.description: Margin of the cross margin order

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-221752070)

posInit.description: Inital margin Cross = opening value/cross leverage; isolated = accumulation of initial margin for each transaction

posMargin.description: Bankruptcy cost Cross = mark value * imr; Isolated = position margin (accumulation of initial margin, additional margin, generated funding fees, etc.)

liquidationPrice.description: Liquidation price For Cross Margin, you can refer to the liquidationPrice, and the liquidation is based on the risk rate.

bankruptPrice.description: Bankruptcy price For Cross Margin, you can refer to the bankruptPrice, and the liquidation is based on the risk rate.

settleCurrency.description: Currency used to clear and settle the trades

autoDeposit.description: Auto deposit margin or not **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

maintMarginReq.description: Maintenance margin requirement **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

riskLimit.description: Risk limit **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

realLeverage.description: Leverage of the order **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posCross.description: added margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posComm.description: Bankruptcy cost **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posLoss.description: Funding fees paid out **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posFunding.description: The current remaining unsettled funding fee for the position **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

posMaint.description: Maintenance margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

maintMargin.description: Position margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**

success.description: Adjustment isolated margin risk limit level successful or not

msg.description: Adjustment isolated margin risk limit level failure reason

SYMBOL.description:
The SYMBOL is the key with value 
"CROSS" or "ISOLATED"

orderId.description: The unique order id generated by the trading system

x-api-enum.name: down
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes below the stopPrice

x-api-enum.name: up
x-api-enum.description: Triggers when the price reaches or goes above the stopPrice

symbol.description: Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-221752070)

x-api-enum.name: open
x-api-enum.description: the order is in the order book（maker order）

x-api-enum.name: triggered
x-api-enum.description: when the stop order has been triggered

x-api-enum.name: cancel
x-api-enum.description: when the order has been canceled
